text: Motorbike many parking nearby masjid.  And do not obstruct others way. Thanks much². Very comfy and peaceful place landed houses area...

Alhamdullilah. This mosque is so peaceful - the interior is extremely comfortable, cool & fully-carpeted. It seems like there’s also a very close-knit community around as there are many volunteers for a relatively small masjid.

For drivers, I think you can park at a compound beside the mosque but because it was my first time and was unsure, there is streetside parking available along Kovan Rd.

This redeveloped masjid located in the Northeast part of the island was first built in 1921. It underwent redevelopment in 1995 and can now accommodate up to 400 people. Some of its activities include madrasah classes and religious lectures for adults. Bus Services:
80, 81, 82, 85, 85M, 97, 111, 136, 153, 106, 61, 67, 857
Nearest MRT Station:
KOVAN
I arrived just after the night prayers were concluded. One of the caretakers allowed me to do my prayers while he waited till I finished. An excellent gesture that deserves my respect. Alhamdulillah

Specially in these days of COVID, the efforts taken by the mosque management in ensuring covid protocols are followed is commendable.   Thanks again for ensuring the community stays safe and singapore stays safe.  Respect!
